label: 中氏
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Officials dispatched by the Lord of Manors (Ryōshu) to his manors (shōen) to supervise the work of the Manorial Officials (Shōshi). Acted as officials of the Manorial Managing Offices (Azukaridokoro). [領主、荘園、荘司、預所]
